description:
A set of armor given to you by the Solus Town
Village Headman. It's very dusty, but unused.
name: Squire Armor
note:
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(1));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Green robes woven by Matilda. They have some
magical defense; physical, not so much.
name: Apprentice Robes
note:
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(2));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Generic vestments that can probably be found
in a magic shop. A good start for a cleric.
name: Training Vestments
note:
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(3));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A run-of-the-mill leather cloak owned by
an ex-Bandito. Dyed red to fit her style.
name: Novice Leathers
note:
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(4));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A simple hat worn by a simple traveler. Tip it to
your neighbor, or your other neighbor, or both!
name: Traveler Hat
note:
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(1));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Crafted with fine yarn. Provides comfort,
but not much defense. Or color.
name: Traveler Shirt
note:
<Hit Damage Sound: Equip3, 90, 150, 0>
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(1));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
The ideal boots for hikes around your hometown, though
the soles quickly give out after leaving flat land.
name: Traveler Boots
note:
<Can Sell>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameParty.members().contains($gameActors.actor(1));
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description: It's a soldier's helmet. What more is there to say?
name: Soldier Helmet

description: It's a soldier's armor. What more is there to say?
name: Soldier Plate Armor

description: It's a soldier's greaves. What more is there to say?
name: Soldier Greaves

description: It's a soldier's shield. What more is there to say?
name: Soldier Shield

description:
When people see this on your head, they'll be sure to
compliment you! But how does it boost your MHP and MMP?
name: Cool-Looking Hat
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1 Feather: 100%
x1-2 Yarn: 80%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Some basic leather armor. It's has a metal lining
on the inside, providing a little extra defense.
name: Leather Gambeson
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-2 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Leather boots fortified with metal. They don't give
much defense, but they make movement easier.
name: Hiking Boots
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-2 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
One of those cool floppy hats you see on the
wizards in books. Provides some extra magic ability.
name: Floppy Hat
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-x2 item 51: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
They don't brace your wrists much, but they
do provide more magical power.
name: Copper Wristbraces
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
While it does help defend against magical attacks,
it also reduces the power of your own.
name: Anti-Magic Charm
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A unique style of Bandito uniform with a
focus on evasion rather than raw defense.
name: Bandito Cloak
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-2 item 51: 100%
x1 Leather: 60%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Steel is basically like upgraded iron. So this
is basically an upgrade of any iron armor.
name: Steel Plate Armor
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1 Steel Ingot: 20%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A small wooden shield reinforced by a steel ring. It
won't grant too much of a defense boost, but it's cheap.
name: Wooden Buckler
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x2-5 Wood: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A heavy shield that packs quite a good defense
boost. Not for the weak-hearted... or weak.
name: Steel Shield
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1 Steel Ingot: 20%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
One of those cool helmets that you see knights
wearing in books and stuff. Looks awesome.
name: Classic Helmet
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1 Iron Cluster: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description: The floppier the hat, the stronger the magic.
name: Floppier Hat
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-x3 item 51: 100%
x1 Yarn: 70%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
They may not look too special, but they've been
enchanted to have some decently strong magic.
name: Gray Robes
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-x4 item 51: 100%
x1-x2 Yarn: 80%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Vestments crafted for clerics who have a true
connection with Trailia. They're pretty good!
name: Prayer Vestments
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-3 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
The shadows within are contained, but slipping on the ring still
evokes a chilling sensation. Reduces incoming \nl[9] damage by 20%.
name: Ring of Shadows

description:
Make movement easier than ever with the newest
model of \ia[14]! Made for pro travelers.
name: Voyager Boots
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-3 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Soft red leathers with a gold trim on the bottom.
Looks sweet, feels sweet, and boosts sweet.
name: Red Leathers
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-3 Yarn: 100%
x1-x3 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description: Matches perfectly with the \ia[28]. Boosts CRI.
name: Red Mask
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-x2 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description: Increases ATK and MAT by 10%.
name: Laeryidyean's Strength
note: <Cannot Rename>

description:
A classy hat that belonged to your brother for many years.
He gifted it to you, wishing you good luck saving the world.
name: Matt's Fedora
note:
<Menu Category: Memorabilia>
<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
condition = user.actorId() == 1;
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
<Custom Equip Requirement Text>
text = '\\c[16]Character: ';
text += user.actorId() == 1 ? '\\c[1]' : '\\c[8]';
text += $gameActors.actor(1).name()
</Custom Equip Requirement Text>

description:
A tome containing the information
necessary to cast \is[37].
name: Bubble (Tome)
note:
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(30);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A powerful set of leathers colored with a mesmerizing
shade of red. Not made with real blood.
name: Blood-Red Leathers
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-4 Yarn: 100%
x2-4 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
A yarn-woven headband dyed with a bloody red identical
to the \ia[33]. Boosts physical lifesteal.
name: Blood-Red Headband
note:
<HP Life Steal Physical: +1%>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-x2 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
A set of bright pink vestments. Even if pink ain't
your style, the sweet boosts are totally worth it!
name: Pink Vestments
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-4 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
An old suit of armor left to crystallize in a cave for
years. The tough mineral provides a solid defense boost.
name: Crystalline Plate Armor
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1 Iron Cluster: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
It feels like dirt, but it still has the softness
of silk. Reduces damage taken by \nl[6] attacks.
name: Earthen Grassrobes
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-3 Rock: 100%
x2-x4 item 51: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
A mystical orb containing the power of an unknown
planet inside of it. Increases \nl[6] resistance.
name: Terra
note: <Upgrade Slots: 1>

description:
The bracing is even worse than before,
but the magic is definitely stronger.
name: Iron Wristbraces
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 100%
x2-4 Iron Cluster: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
Boots made out of a fine leather, boosting AGI, CRI,
and EVA at the cost of less protection than metal boots.
name: Leather Boots
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-5 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Slim black gloves that give you a better grip
on your weapon, boosting your HIT and CRI.
name: Black Gloves
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-x3 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description: Increases ATK by 10% but decreases DEF by 20%.
name: Giant Goblin's Rage
note: <Cannot Rename>

description:
The warding effect of this charm is much stronger than
usual. Its negative effect on the user has also increased.
name: Enchanted Anti-Magic Charm
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 100%
x2-4 Iron Cluster: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A set of heavily reinforced greaves meant to
boost your defense and agility simultaneously.
name: Knight's Greaves
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Leather: 4
Worn Cloth: 5
Iron Cluster: 4
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Protective Footwear>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 60%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A set of heavily enforced gauntlets. They've been
specially made to provide defense and support attacks.
name: Knight's Gauntlets
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Iron Cluster: 7
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Protective Armwear>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 60%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
Taking speed EVEN FURTHER BEYOND!!
Further boosts your AGI, EVA, and CRI.
name: Speedster Boots
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Leather Boots
Feather: 2
Bat Wing: 2
Yarn
Wind Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Speedy Footwear>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-x4 Leather: 100%
x1 Feather: 100%
x1 Feather: 50%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
A shield offering a respectable amount of defense, while
maintaining its "light" status and minimizing AGI loss.
name: Copper Buckler
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Copper Cluster: 8
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Respectable Light Shield>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Copper Cluster: 60%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A well-made copy of the shields used by Tellurian knights. However,
it's not as strong, and it doesn't have the beautiful red coloring.
name: Replica Knight's Shield
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Steel Ingot: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Heavy Shield>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1 Steel Ingot: 60%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
Allows the wearer to look a bit into the future, helping them predict
the enemy's moves. Reduces enemy crit chance against the user by 8%.
name: Henry's Charm
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameVariables.value(46) >= 3;
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Allows the wearer to see the undead, preventing
them from being scared of the unknown.
name: Soulfire Lantern
note: <Cannot Rename>

description:
Armor consisting of several dark plates welded together.
It seems to almost absorb light. Reduces incoming \nl[9] damage.
name: Shadowplate Armor
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Dark Essence: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(56);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A set of mystical robes. They seem to almost be phasing
in and out of another plane. Reduces incoming \nl[8] damage.
name: Phantasmal Robes
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Light Essence: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(56);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A simple yet powerful set of vestments. The lining seems to be
shinier, and it emanates magical power. Increases outgoing healing.
name: Phantasmal Vestments
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Element Magnify Healing: +5%>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x3-5 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(56);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Otherworldly leathers. The shadowy essence coursing
through them allows you to rarely dodge magic attacks.
name: Shadowspec Leathers
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Dark Essence: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(56);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A fancy and extremely powerful scarf. A quick whip
of it can rarely reflect an enemy's magic attack.
name: Phantasmal Scarf
note: <Upgrade Slots: 1>

description:
Reduces damage taken by magic attacks by 5%, but
increases damage taken by physical attacks by 20%.

description:
A tome containing the information
necessary to cast \is[47].

note:
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(56);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description: Increases DEF and MDF by 10%.

note: <Cannot Rename>

description:
An ancient necklace that allows the wearer to leech
their target's life force, equal to 3% of damage dealt.
name: Soulstealer's Necklace
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<HP Life Steal: +3%>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(53);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Padded leather gloves that combine comfort and
practicality. They once belonged to Henry.
name: Henry's Gloves
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x2-4 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameVariables.value(46) >= 3;
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A clump of dense green gel, with bonds similar to that
of a crystal. Can be equipped or sold for a good price.
name: Condensed Green Gel
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x5-10 Green Gel: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A hunk of dense blue gel, with the luster of a of
a jewel. Can be equipped or sold for a good price.
name: Condensed Blue Gel
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x5-10 Blue Gel: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A massive clump of rat fur stuck together so solidly
that it's practically a shield in its own right.
name: Tough Pelt
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x4-10 Rat Fur: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description: A pristine claw once belonging to a very large rat.
name: Rat Claw

description:
A tribal horn that makes one's voice boom as loud
as an avalanche. Provides immunity to \it[21]\c[0].
name: Horn

description:
A small hand-held mirror that allows you to watch the
enemy from an angle. Provides immunity to \it[20]\c[0].
name: Pocket Mirror

description:
A small bell that can be hung on one's hair, jingling
to keep them awake. Provides immunity to \it[22]\c[0].
name: Bell

description:
A basic pair of gloves that most Banditos can
be found wearing. They boost your HIT and CRI.
name: Bandito Gloves
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1 Leather: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
A curious ring with a fine emerald as its centerpiece.
It mysteriously boosts the vigor of its holder.
name: Emerald Ring
note: <Upgrade Slots: 1>

description:
A strange ring with a fine ruby as its centerpiece.
It mysteriously boosts the strength of its holder.
name: Ruby Ring
note: <Upgrade Slots: 1>

description:
A rather clean fang that once belonged to
a goblin. It was dislodged during battle.
name: Goblin Fang
note: <Upgrade Slots: 1>

description:
A group of dense red gel, with the texture of a of
a gem. Can be equipped or sold for a pretty good price.
name: Condensed Red Gel
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x5-10 Red Gel: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A generic glass shard you found laying around.
Increases ATK by 25%, but cuts into you as well.
name: Shard of Glass
note: <Passive State: 34>

description:
A flake of bat skin with a little bit of magic
within. Imbues attacks with the power of Wind.
name: Enchanted Bat Skin
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Wind Essence: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A small charm with a bead of jade at the end. It's said to guide
lost souls to the afterlife. Increases received \nl[11] by 50%.
name: Jade Charm
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:
An arc-shaped headpiece that fits easily
onto one's head. Increases magical stats.
name: Prayer Headpiece
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1 Tarantula Silk: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
An intricate headpiece created using fine silk and a beautiful rose.
It boosts the wearer's outgoing healing by a small but noticeable 5%.
name: Rose Headpiece
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Element Magnify Healing: +5%>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Tarantula Silk: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A peculiar piece of head armor that still contains the

note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Skeleton Skull
Dark Essence: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Peculiar Dark Head Armor>

description:
A legendary power bestowed upon you by Andrew.
Triples your experience gain as long as it's equipped.

description:
A legendary power bestowed upon you by Andrew.
Overpowers your experience gain as long as it's equipped.

description:
A mass of dense white gel, with the feel of a precious

Even better boots than the \ia[27]!

description:
An exquisite display of one's wealth, sure to
have heads turning when walking the streets.
name: Dapper-Looking Hat
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1 Feather: 100%
x2-5 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
\N[3] says that comets symbolize the death of an evil god from long ago. Once per battle,
when the wearer's MP drops below 25%, they will instantly regenerate 50% of their MP.
name: Comet Charm
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<Passive State: 70>

description:
Increases bits received at the end of battle by
10%. Stacks if equipped on multiple party members.
name: Magic Coin
note: <Upgrade Slots: 1>

description:
An enchanted strip of lace taken from an old dress. Boosts the
damage of skills that harness any of the ten elements by 10%.
name: Elemental Lace

description:
A beautifully crafted harp. Any hit on an enemy has a 40% chance to generate
a healing orb that will heal the most injured party member by 8% of damage dealt.
name: Conjurer's Harp
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<Passive State: 74>

description:
A mysterious orb with a burning fire raging inside.
Increases ATK and MAT of party members and enemies by 15%.
name: Orb of Wrath
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<Passive State: 75>

description:
A curious orb with blue waves crashing on shores inside.
Increases DEF and MDF of party members and enemies by 15%.
name: Orb of Protection
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<Passive State: 77>

description:
Provides a lot of DEF and MDF, as well as nullifying a
lot of incoming damage. However, you'll be a lot slower.
name: Giant Turtle Shell
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:

Tellurium Alloy
</Synthesis Ingredients>

description:

Disables all experience gain, in case you would like to
farm an area without breaking progression by over-leveling.
name: EXP Suppressor

description:
Advanced sand-warping technology used by ancient civilizations
to prevent oversleeping. Provides immunity to \it[149]\c[0].
name: Sleepy Hourglass

description:
It's burning hot, yet feels only lukewarm to the touch. Provides
immunity to \it[7], \it[82], \it[149], and \it[125].
name: Fiery Tablet
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Passive State: 126>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Selfish Candle
Wanted Poster
Sleepy Hourglass
Fire Resistance Potion: 3
Fiery Blood: 30
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Hot Dungeon Resistance Item>

description:
An even tighter chunk of rat fur, providing
much more DEF than most light shields.
name: Resiliant Pelt
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x8-20 Rat Fur: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
All semblance of actual bracing has been lost; however, the magical
power of these wristbraces has reached the highest potential.
name: Silver Wristbraces
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>

<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x1-2 Iron Cluster: 100%
x2-4 Iron Cluster: 50%
x3-6 Iron Cluster: 25%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
Removing the gems in each ring and affixing both of them to the
\ia[173] results in the creation of this powerful accessory.
name: Charm of Duality
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 2>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Gazer Charm
Ruby Ring
Emerald Ring
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Combination Charm>

description:
A tome containing the information
necessary to cast \is[57].
name: Soul Shackles (Tome)
note:
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(53);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Difficult to forge, and its price reflects that. Provides DEF on
par with some heavy shields while remaining light and non-obstructive.
name: Silver Buckler
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:
Desperate for attention, this candle draws all the fire to it,
leaving you without any. Provides immunity to \it[7]\c[0].
name: Selfish Candle

description:
The upgrades continue! Tellurium has enhanced
the elemental flow of these wristbraces.
name: Fiery Wristbraces
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 3>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Silver Wristbraces
Fiery Blood: 10
Ectoplasm: 3
Tellurium Alloy
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Upgraded Wristbraces>

description:
Tying yourself to a nearby tree or rock makes it hard for
the wind to knock you back. Provides immunity to \it[162]\c[0].
name: Taut Rope

description:
Properly braced armor prevents hard impacts from
denting it. Provides immunity to \it[165]\c[0].
name: Armor Bracing

description:
An ancient shield forged a millenium ago for the chosen hero. Specially
enchanted to provide immunity to \it[163]\c[0], \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0]'s signature move.
name: Shield of the Hero
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 3>

<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSelfSwitches.value([7, 14, 'A']);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Tellurium and imp blood have enhanced this magic equip. Attacks have a 60% chance
to generate an orb that heals the lowest HP party member by 12% of damage dealt.
name: Fiery Harp
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 3>
<Passive State: 166>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Conjurer's Harp
Fiery Blood: 10
Ectoplasm: 3
Tellurium Alloy
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Upgraded Harp>

description:
Increases outgoing elemental damage by a
whopping 20%. Tellurium is powerful!
name: Fiery Lace
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 3>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Elemental Lace
Fiery Blood: 10
Ectoplasm: 3
Tellurium Alloy
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Upgraded Lace>

description: You start the battle with 1 BP.
name: Old Dilong's Wisdom
note: <Cannot Rename>

description:
Infused with the essence of the Dark Forest.
The wearer recovers 5 HP at the end of every turn.
name: Ring of the Woods
note: <Passive State: 173>

description:
A unique yarn-woven head accessory. Its red coloration
is faded yet seemingly vivid. Boosts physical lifesteal.
name: Red Headband
note:
<HP Life Steal Physical: +0.5%>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-x2 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Don't worry, this won't put
blood in your eyes. Boosts CRI.
name: Blood-Red Mask
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1-x2 Yarn: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description:
Sign your soul away... oh, never mind, this just needs a drop
of your blood. Doubles the effectiveness of recovery items.
name: Blood Pact
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:
Something about this is terrifying. You want to look at
it, but you can't. Reduces incoming physical damage by 20%.
name: Flesh Doll
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:
Unique armor made with thousands of tiny silver
links. Doesn't provide any class-specific benefits.
name: Silver Chainmail
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:
A peculiar phenomenon caused by mana overflowing a plant and permanently
altering part of its coloration. Not dangerous. Reduces MP costs by 20%.
name: Mana-Stained Blueroot
note: <Upgrade Slots: 2>

description:
Mysterious currency of an unknown denomination.
Brings out the inner flame that lurks within.
name: Infernal Coin
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 3>
<Passive State: 184>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Infernal Wand
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: New Form>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
condition = user.actorId() == 2;
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
<Custom Equip Requirement Text>
text = '\\c[16]Character: ';
text += user.actorId() == 2 ? '\\c[1]' : '\\c[8]';
text += $gameActors.actor(2).name()
</Custom Equip Requirement Text>

description:
This is the next level of wristbraces after the
\ia[185]! Power creep, am I right?
name: Andrew's Wristbraces
note: <Upgrade Slots: 4>

description:
Slightly stained. A plant was pleasantly surprised
to find it could bite people trying to pick it.
name: Sharp Tooth

description:
Nabbed from a fanatic magician obsessed with staying
alive. Negates 1/5th of incoming damage when below 50% HP.
name: Green Mage Crystal
note: <Passive State: 194>

description:
Wisdom passed down in the form of a story over thousands of years.
Reduces \nl[9] damage by 10% and increases outgoing \nl[8] damage by 10%.
name: Holy Scriptures
note: <Element Amplify 8: +10%>

description:
Grants 1 extra BP capacity, but only if a different
party member has \ia[205] equipped.
name: Infernal Knight's Synergy
note:
<Passive State: 197>
<Cannot Rename>

description:
Grants 1 extra BP capacity, but only if a different
party member has \ia[204] equipped.
name: Infernal Mage's Synergy
note:
<Passive State: 197>
<Cannot Rename>

description:
Vanity outfit for \N[1]. Part of the \c[30]Villainous\c[0] set.
Changes your appearance to mimic that of a powerful skeleton.
name: Skeletal Outfit
note:
<Menu Category: Vanity>
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
condition = user.actorId() == 1;
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
<Custom Equip Requirement Text>
text = '\\c[16]Character: ';

</Custom Equip Requirement Text>

Vanity outfit for \N[3]. Part of the \c[30]Villainous\c[0] set.

note:

description:
Vanity outfit for \N[4]. Part of the \c[30]Villainous\c[0] set.

note:

condition = user.actorId() == 4;

text = '\\c[16]Character: ';

</Custom Equip Requirement Text>

description:
Infused with the essence of the Lost Forest.
The wearer recovers 25 HP at the end of every turn.
name: Ring of the Forest
note: <Passive State: 199>

description:
Vanity outfit for \N[1] and \N[2]. Part of the \c[16]Trail Team\c[0] set.
Makes you look like a slightly unstable programmer.
name: Blue Developer Outfit
note:
<Menu Category: Vanity>
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
condition = [1, 2].contains(user.actorId());
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
<Custom Equip Requirement Text>
text = '\\c[16]Character: ';
text += user.actorId() == 1 ? '\\c[1]' : '\\c[8]';
text += $gameActors.actor(1).name();
text += "\\c[0] or ";
text += user.actorId() == 2 ? '\\c[1]' : '\\c[8]';
text += $gameActors.actor(2).name();
</Custom Equip Requirement Text>

description:
Vanity outfit for \N[1] and \N[2]. Part of the \c[16]Trail Team\c[0] set.
Makes you look like a somewhat reserved thinker.
name: Red Developer Outfit
note:
<Menu Category: Vanity>
<Cannot Rename>

<Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
condition = [1, 2].contains(user.actorId());
</Custom Equip Requirement Condition>
<Custom Equip Requirement Text>
text = '\\c[16]Character: ';
text += user.actorId() == 1 ? '\\c[1]' : '\\c[8]';
text += $gameActors.actor(1).name();
